reviews.review: This class was extremely easy. Guest lectures every class, no exams, 2 midterm papers, 300 word free write reflection each week. There is an attendance grade I think its 10%? The final is a group presentation and a group paper. I wish Professor Bravo taught more however, only a few of his classes were taught by him and he was really passionate and a strong lecturuer. Some of the guest lectures put me to sleep, but I always looked forward to coming to this class to find out who the next guest lecturer would be. Covered a huge arrary of archeology and you did not really have to learn the material becuase you weren't tested on it. However, I found that I was really engaged with the lectures and found them interesting so I was learning the material with no pressure.
